name: Visitation 2
description:
Visitation 2 takes place at the same time. As the first one. But this time you play as a girl named Martha.

Martha is spending a night at her friend's dorm room.  Waiting for her to return she has a nightmare and wakes up to find a tape that puts her right back into one. 

You must find the blue tapes and escape

Game controls

Press P to get to settings.

USE/ACTION - LEFT or RIGHT CLICK Interact

CAMERA TOGGLE - MID MOUSE Wheel

CROUCH - CTRL

RUN - SHIFT

MENU - Esc

CORNER PEAK - Q E 

E - KEY TO WAKE UP
